dialogues.content: Do you choose to confess your love to Yvonne?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Uh, hey, Yvonne... I, um, I've been wanting to talk to you. It’s kind of hard for me to say this, but... I guess, I mean…

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Hey Vincent! What's up? You seem a bit nervous. Is everything okay?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine. It's just that, um, I’ve been thinking a lot lately. About us. Well, not us, us, but you know, um, you and me, and…

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Right, so, um, I've really enjoyed spending time with you. Like, a lot. And, uh, you've been on my mind, I mean, pretty much all the time.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: This is hard to say, but I think, well, I more than just like you, Yvonne. I... I really like you. Like, like-like you. You know?

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Vincent, that’s really sweet. I'm really glad you shared that with me. You know, I... I feel a lot for you too.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: But, I've been thinking about this a lot, and I believe right now, our main focus should be on our studies, especially with the exams coming up.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I understand, Yvonne. It's just that I couldn't keep it to myself anymore.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: And I'm glad you didn't. It means a lot to me, really. But let’s make a promise, okay? Let’s both give our best for these exams.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: And if, you know, we both end up in the same college, maybe then, we can explore this... us, without any distractions or worries.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: That sounds like a plan. It gives me even more motivation to do well now.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Exactly! And no matter what, Vincent, you're very special to me. Let's work hard together and see where the future takes us.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I did a set of last year's exam questions yesterday, and they are better than last time!

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: This is the result of your hard work, let’s keep working hard! !
